ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Geometric_validation_property_representation is the association of a solid or surface Geometric_model with a representation of a property derived from the geometry it contains.
The following properties are allowed:
centroid: centre of volume of a geometric solid model. In that case, the property_representation shall contain a Cartesian_point. This instance of Cartesian_point shall have the name 'centre point' ;
volume: amount of space occupied by the solid model. In that case, the property_representation shall contain a Measure_item representing a volume measure. This instance of Measure_item shall have the name 'volume measure';
surface area: area measurement of the surface of the entire solid or surface model. In that case, the property_representation shall contain a Measure_item representing an area measure. This instance of Measure_item shall have the name 'surface area measure'.
When used to validate an exchange of geometric model, the following process may be used:
The sender would populate the geometric validation properties in the exchange file, usually calculated by their CAD systems.
The receiver would perform geometric translations or transformations that are necessary on the solid or surface model.
The receiver would then calculate the properties of the resultant geometry.
Compare these with the values in the exchange file.
If they are within an agreed tolerance then the exchange is deemed to have been validated.
the Representation that provides the valued characteristics.
the Cartesian_point in case of the centroid property or the Measure_item in case of the surface area and volume properties, that provides the value of the property.
the Geometric_model from which the geometric validation property has been computed.
the context of the property_representation shall be a numerical context. In case of the centroid property, the context shall be a Geometric_coordinate_space.
the name of the property_representation shall be either 'centroid, 'surface area' or 'volume'.
the property_value item shall be a member of the items of the property_representation.
